COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2
STRING: For the next two days, almost nothing at all happened,
and I was able to dedicate a lot of time to practicing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108
STRING: The saving grace about practice was that when I was
doing it, I was able to forget about everything else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e
STRING: Today was the first day of practice at school for this
year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134
STRING: I went to the practice room early in the morning, as I
was slightly worried, and waited there for Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a
STRING: And then, he arrived slightly earlier than usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, morning!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192
STRING: [Chris] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8
STRING: Yesterday and the day before, our rehearsals went by
pleasantly with no problems at all. Chris seemed to be
in good spirits, and not down at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be
STRING: I thought he may have just been putting on a brave
face, but considering how he has been up until now, it
really seemed like he had gotten over something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4
STRING: My guess was that he left everything in Arie's hands.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0
STRING: I supposed I would know tomorrow when Chris's letter
arrived.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6
STRING: I had an idea in mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202
STRING: But, it was going to take a lot of bravery, and I wasn't
ready for that right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x218
STRING: Tomorrow was the deadline for declaring our recital
partners, but I was still unsure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x224
STRING: But right now wasn't the time for that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230
STRING: Just like Chris, I was pretending to be happy and
cheerful as the days went by.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x274
STRING: [Chris] “It's pretty crowded, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28a
STRING: [Torta] “What did you expect? But, it's okay!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d2
STRING: [Torta] “I came in early and saved us a room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e8
STRING: Saying this, I gestured to the door of one of the practice
rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fc
STRING: [Chris] “You did? You're quite well prepared.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x312
STRING: [Torta] “Well I have to be, since a certain someone who
will go unnamed, isn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34e
STRING: [Chris] “That is most certainly true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x364
STRING: [Torta] “You could try denying it, you know...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x382
STRING: [Chris] “Nope, I really can't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x398
STRING: [Torta] “＊sigh＊ Oh well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ae
STRING: Even if it was only on the surface, this kind of
cheerfulness was necessary for us right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fa
STRING: [Chris] “This a bit careless.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x410
STRING: Upon entering the practice room, that was the first
thing Chris said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41c
STRING: [Torta] “But, most people won't try to use the room if
they see a bag sitting here like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x432
STRING: Perhaps it was because there were many students with
good upbringings, but I had never heard of any cases of
theft in the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x448
STRING: It didn't change the fact that it was careless, but I had
made a point of choosing when and where I would do
something like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47a
STRING: [Chris] “You've got a point, though. I would choose a
different room, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x490
STRING: [Torta] “Exactly. And besides, I was here first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b0
STRING: The room happened to be empty, and since I actually
had arrived early, I didn't feel any guilt for keeping the
room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c6
STRING: That was also one of the reasons I came so early today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4da
STRING: [Chris] “What time did you get here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f0
STRING: [Torta] “Nine o'clock on the dot, I think. I did my voice
warm ups and that kind of thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x522
STRING: [Chris] “Gah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x538
STRING: [Torta] “Vocal chords take a lot longer to warm up than
instruments do, after all. I always arrive about thirty
minutes before rehearsal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x574
STRING: [Chris] “I should've expected no less.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58a
STRING: [Torta] “Now, what about you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a0
STRING: I had already finished everything I needed to prepare.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ac
STRING: All that was left was to wait for Chris to finish getting
set up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c0
STRING: [Chris] “I'm just about ready over here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d6
STRING: Perhaps he was slightly influenced by my actions, but
Chris had been setting up as we spoke, and was ready
to start playing any time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f6
STRING: I was pleased, but also felt I shouldn't praise him too
much, so I decided to just start rehearsing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60c
STRING: [Torta] “Well, shall we just go through it once for now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x622
STRING: The moment I said this, someone knocked on the door
of the sound proofed room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x654
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66a
STRING: Chris peeked through the small window in the door, as
he was the closest to it, and said a name I hadn't been
expecting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x688
STRING: [Chris] “M-Ms. Cordell.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d4
STRING: [Chris] “G-Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f2
STRING: [Cordell] “Good morning. I know it's early, but I'm glad
you're here. I guess we have Tortinita to thank for this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72e
STRING: [Chris] “That is correct...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x744
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, Ms. Cordell, good morning. What brings
you here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76c
STRING: [Cordell] “Good morning. I thought I'd drop by and see
the faces of my students and how they're doing, now
that the holiday is over.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: [Chris] “I can understand wanting to see our faces, but...
How we're doing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c6
STRING: [Cordell] “I thought I'd watch you perform one more
time. What do you say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7dc
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, in that case, please do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80e
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, if you wouldn't mind, we'd really appreciate
that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x840
STRING: [Cordell] “That's the spirit. Very well, 1:30 at the usual
classroom.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x868
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89a
STRING: [Cordell] “Well then, carry on with your usual practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c8
STRING: Just like she always did, Ms. Cordell stated her business
concisely, and then left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8de
STRING: Ms. Cordell has helped us out with so many things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ea
STRING: I didn't want to show her a poor performance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f6
STRING: [Torta] “Well then, I guess we have to make an effort to
practice extra hard, now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x90c
STRING: I focused myself even more upon saying this, and Chris
nodded silently in response.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95e
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, shall we get going?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x990
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Oh, it's already time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a6
STRING: It was still a little early, but I didn't want to be late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b2
STRING: We got up and started to make a move, so that we
wouldn't have to stress.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9da
STRING: [Chris] “I felt the same last time too, but it's a little
nerve-wracking, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f0
STRING: Chris literally seemed nerve-wracked as he said this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fc
STRING: [Torta] “If you get so nervous just over this, what are
you going to do when you actually perform on stage?
You're supposed to be a guy, but you're so
sensitive.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa38
STRING: [Chris] “More sensitive than you are, at least.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4e
STRING: [Torta] “What are you trying to say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa80
STRING: [Chris] “That right there, is what I'm talking about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa96
STRING: [Torta] “If I was as sensitive as you are, Chris, I wouldn't
be able to cope.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac8
STRING: [Chris] “Cope with what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xade
STRING: [Torta] “All kinds of things...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf4
STRING: I felt that I had become a bit more pushy than I used to
be.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb00
STRING: If I hadn't, I don't think I could deal with Chris or Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb16
STRING: But... I also had the feeling that I'd become even
weaker, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2c
STRING: I felt like I got hurt over the smallest thing, and that I
cried more easily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb66
STRING: Ms. Cordell said she had something she needed to do,
and for the five minutes that she was gone, we read
through our scores and waited.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7c
STRING: And then, Ms. Cordell returned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba4
STRING: [Cordell] “Sorry to keep you waiting. It seems that you
are both ready, so would you like to start?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe0
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfe
STRING: [Cordell] “Very well, begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc14
STRING: [Torta] “A-Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2c
STRING: It was incredibly sudden, but it wasn't as if we were not
prepared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc42
STRING: I switched mindsets immediately, and turned to face
Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4e
STRING: The overture of the Fortelle resounded, and in that
instant I was able to sing, and forget about everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcba
STRING: [Cordell] “That was quite good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd0
STRING: Seeming pleased, Ms. Cordell showed a slight smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcdc
STRING: I had been told that she rarely gave out praise, but it
felt like she was praising us a lot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0e
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd24
STRING: [Torta] “Phew... Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3a
STRING: The two of us thanked her, and waited for what she
would say next.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd62
STRING: [Cordell] “However...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd94
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Were there any problems?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc6
STRING: [Cordell] “No, none in particular.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xddc
STRING: There was a strange pause in the middle when she
spoke, but I knew that she was being honest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf2
STRING: However, it seemed that there was something bothering
her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfe
STRING: Knowing Ms. Cordell's personality, I doubted that she
would tell us what it was, however.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe30
STRING: [Chris] “Phew... As long as that's the case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4e
STRING: [Cordell] “Be sure to keep doing what you are doing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6c
STRING: [Chris] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe82
STRING: [Torta] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb8
STRING: I had planned to keep rehearsing after this, but when
we were hurrying to pack up, Ms. Cordell spoke to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee0
STRING: [Cordell] “Before you leave, there's something I'd like to
talk to you about. Could you stay behind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1c
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Ah... Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf32
STRING: Chris turned around and answered immediately, so for a
moment I thought I had misunderstood.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf48
STRING: But, Ms. Cordell was still looking straight at me as she
continued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5c
STRING: [Cordell] “Not you, Chris. I was speaking to Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7c
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... Yes, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf92
STRING: What did she want to talk about?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa6
STRING: [Cordell] “It's concerning the vocal course. You may
leave, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe2
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, in that case I will excuse myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff8
STRING: Ms. Cordell said it was about the vocal course, but
nothing really came to mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1004
STRING: The deadline for declaring our partners was today, but
we had already taken care of that in the morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101a
STRING: For the time being, I needed to hear what Ms. Cordell
wanted to talk about, so I decided to have Chris head
back first while I stayed behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1030
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, then, you go back first. Let's meet in the
same practice room, if it's still available. If it isn't... Um,
will this take long?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1062
STRING: [Cordell] “Only four or five minutes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1078
STRING: [Torta] “Thank you. Chris, could you wait in the practice
room? I don't want someone else to take it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a0
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. Okay, umm, I'll be going, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10be
STRING: [Cordell] “Sure. I'm generally here all day, so come by
anytime you have questions or would like me to watch
you rehearse. I will do what I can to help.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f0
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1106
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, I'll see you soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1124
STRING: [Chris] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1148
STRING: Saying this, Chris then headed out, leaving me with Ms.
Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1154
STRING: [Torta] “So... Um, what is it about the vocal course that
you would like to talk about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1174
STRING: I wasn't sure why, but I felt that she may have been
lying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1180
STRING: Perhaps it would be more accurate to say that she was
making an excuse to have Chris leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119e
STRING: [Cordell] “I lied.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b4
STRING: [Torta] “I had a feeling that was the case...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d2
STRING: [Cordell] “Yes, I suppose you can see through that kind
of thing. You can be sharp at times.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f2
STRING: [Torta] “I... Don't think that's true. But, why did you have
to lie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1210
STRING: [Cordell] “There's something I wanted to ask you. Did
something happen to Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1230
STRING: [Torta] “To Chris...? No, nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124e
STRING: [Cordell] “You have an idea, don't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1264
STRING: [Torta] “You're quite sharp too...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1296
STRING: [Cordell] “It comes with age. You're still a child, even if
you try to act like you're not. No different to Chris. And
besides, I can tell that something is wrong just by
hearing the way Chris
[Cordell] plays his Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12dc
STRING: [Cordell] “And since you're trying to hide it, I suppose
that you're part of the reason he plays differently.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fc
STRING: [Torta] “Yes... I suppose so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131a
STRING: [Cordell] “Don't feel like talking, huh? But, there are
some things that get better when you talk about them.
You can talk about it, if you like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133a
STRING: [Torta] “It's not something that I should speak to other
people about...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1358
STRING: [Cordell] “I see. That's fine. Now, shall we continue?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136e
STRING: [Torta] “What do you mean, ‘continue?’”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138c
STRING: [Cordell] “What we just talked about was private. Next
I'm going to speak about something official.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a2
STRING: [Torta] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d4
STRING: [Cordell] “What is your opinion of the way Chris has
been playing the Fortelle recently...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f4
STRING: [Torta] “Recently? It's... Hard to say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1426
STRING: [Cordell] “His ups and downs have always been intense,
but especially so in recent days. You have an idea why,
do you not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1446
STRING: [Torta] “Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1464
STRING: [Cordell] “Alright. Changing topics, what do you think is
the appeal of the way Chris plays the Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1484
STRING: [Torta] “The appeal? I think it's the particular... How
should I put it, essence of the Fortelle...?”
[Torta] “There is a difference between each player,
and the way that Chris sounds different is what
makes his sound special...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b6
STRING: [Cordell] “Exactly. And, where do you think that
difference comes from?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d6
STRING: [Torta] “I'm not sure... I am a voice student, after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f4
STRING: [Cordell] “When I was a student, there was a Fortelle
player in my year level who had an interesting theory
about this. He believed that magic was an emotion.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x151c
STRING: [Cordell] “He is now a teacher at this school, teaching
Fortelle theory, I believe. Perhaps you have heard this
before? You would have learned this in the first or
second year, even if you

COMMANDS.LABEL: 151c
STRING: [Cordell] are in the vocal course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1546
STRING: [Torta] “I believe I have, yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: [Cordell] “He loves to chat, so I am sure he would have
spoken about it at some point.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b4
STRING: [Cordell] “To tell the truth, I think that to some degree it
is true. I feel that intense emotions are what bring out
the sounds of the Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15de
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f4
STRING: What was she trying to say to me...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1600
STRING: I still didn't understand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160c
STRING: But... She was not the type of person to bring up
something like this without a reason; she may have just
been concerned about not only Chris, but me as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162c
STRING: It would have been rude to say she was being
especially serious... But, she wasn't speaking in her
usual seemingly emotionless way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164a
STRING: [Cordell] “Then, what is the greatest emotion that Chris
has? Tortinita, where does the magic of his music lie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166a
STRING: [Torta] “...Do I have to answer this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1688
STRING: [Cordell] “I am deeply concerned about his future. And I
think you are, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a8
STRING: [Torta] “Sadness...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c6
STRING: [Cordell] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16dc
STRING: [Torta] “His greatest emotion, is sadness.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170e
STRING: [Cordell] “Exactly. After hearing him play again and
again, it is hard not to notice it. That deep sadness.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172e
STRING: [Torta] “But... Why do you bring this up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1760
STRING: [Cordell] “Did you notice that when you and Chris
partnered up, the way he played changed for a time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1780
STRING: [Torta] “Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1796
STRING: I couldn't remember when, but I had thought that at
some point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a2
STRING: But, this conversation was jumping all over the place
and I couldn't keep up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b6
STRING: [Cordell] “And just before Natale, you played for me
one time, did you not? I think that was the time that the
way he played sounded the most... cheerful.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e8
STRING: [Cordell] “And today after hearing him play, it seemed
as if the way he played had reverted to how it was
before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1808
STRING: [Torta] “By ‘how it was before’ you mean...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x183a
STRING: [Cordell] “To the dark, sad way he played. You know it
well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1850
STRING: [Torta] “That's... Because there is something bothering
him.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1882
STRING: [Cordell] “I imagine so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1898
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? But... Wait a moment. If sadness is what
makes his music magical...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c0
STRING: [Cordell] “Then the happier be becomes, the more the
magic will fade. To tell the truth, I had felt this about
two weeks ago when I heard him play before Natale.
Did you not feel it

COMMANDS.LABEL: 18c0
STRING: [Cordell] yourself?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ea
STRING: [Torta] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1908
STRING: [Cordell] “I see. I suppose you were busy yourself. That
can't be helped. Either way, the more happiness that he
felt, the less I could feel the magic in his music.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x193a
STRING: [Cordell] “And now, today, the way he plays has
reverted to how it was. As his teacher, you know I
cannot help but ask about this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195a
STRING: Had I not noticed...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1966
STRING: That certainly could have been true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1972
STRING: I was... Happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x197e
STRING: I was stupidly happy because I was able to partner up
with Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198a
STRING: Which was natural.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1996
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a2
STRING: [Torta] “What are you trying to say? That Chris
shouldn't be happy? That he has to stay the way he is?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19cc
STRING: [Torta] “Is his future something that's yours to decide?
And is that going to be what's best for him?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a08
STRING: [Cordell] “Calm down, that's not what I meant. It is true
that one of the reasons Chris's skill with the Fortelle is
evaluated highly, is because of the sadness in it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4e
STRING: [Cordell] “Although, there are many musicians who
would dislike it, so it can't be said that it's something
that appeals to everyone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8a
STRING: [Cordell] “However, I for one believe that if Chris is
happy, then that is for the best, Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aaa
STRING: [Torta] “Even if as a result, that meant that he could not
make it as a musician...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aca
STRING: I guess that was a contradiction...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad6
STRING: I suppose it was true that the reason Chris had made it
as far as he had at this school was because of the
magic that his Fortelle playing possessed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af6
STRING: But, the thought of it being no good if he felt happiness
was...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b1e
STRING: [Cordell] “Jumping to conclusions like that is why you're
still a child. I thought you were a bit more mature for
your age, but now I can see what Asino meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b48
STRING: [Torta] “Did Asino say something...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b66
STRING: [Cordell] “He said that when it comes to Chris, you
become so frantic that it's actually kind of cute. But,
don't worry, apparently you're not Asino's type.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b90
STRING: [Torta] “That idiot...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bae
STRING: [Cordell] “Don't be like that. Despite what you may
think, he worries about you. He may not seem like it,
but he's good natured.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd8
STRING: [Torta] “He's petty. Even more so than he thinks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0a
STRING: [Cordell] “That's an interesting opinion. Of course, I
think there's more to him than that. Oh... But we're not
here to talk about Asino, are we? All I'm saying is
don't jump to

COMMANDS.LABEL: 1c0a
STRING: [Cordell] conclusions.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c34
STRING: [Torta] “About Chris's future?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c52
STRING: [Cordell] “Hmm, why don't I tell you a story from the
past?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c68
STRING: [Torta] “Another one...? Why do you have to beat
around the bush like this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c90
STRING: [Cordell] “Because you won't tell me what's going on.
And yet, you're seeking help. You just don't want to say
it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ccc
STRING: [Cordell] “And I think that I can help you. That's why
we're talking about this kind of thing... Because you're
not very honest with yourself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cf6
STRING: [Torta] “Would you be angry... If I said I didn't want to
hear it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d28
STRING: [Cordell] “Of course not. But, you don't want to hear
about me and my once broken heart?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d48
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sorry...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d7a
STRING: [Cordell] “I'm sure Chris would enjoy hearing about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d90
STRING: [Torta] “What on earth are you talking about...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc2
STRING: [Cordell] “Not interested? I've never told anyone about
this. I won't mind in the least if you then want to tell
others.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dec
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0a
STRING: [Cordell] “Very well, I shall take that as a yes. This was
from a time when I was still young.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2a
STRING: [Torta] “You're really going to tell me, aren't you...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e40
STRING: It didn't make any sense...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4c
STRING: Why was I still here, listening to this kind of story?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e74
STRING: [Cordell] “At the time, I was far worse at the Fortelle
than I am now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8a
STRING: [Torta] “Worse than you are now?... But you're a
teacher.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eb2
STRING: [Cordell] “That's not what I meant. I have technical
abilities, yes, but that's all I have. That is the reason I
cannot become a musician. The music I play has no
magic.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1edc
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1efa
STRING: [Cordell] “Which is why I became a teacher. I have no
regrets. And besides, technical ability is the one thing I
have. I am suited to teaching, and I enjoy it too.
Anyway, may I continue?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f24
STRING: [Torta] “Y-Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f42
STRING: [Cordell] “Long story short, I did not have talent.
However, I had someone that I loved from the bottom
of my heart. His name... Doesn't matter, I suppose.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f88
STRING: [Cordell] “I loved him, but he did not love me. I tried to
make it work, but I failed. And that night... I played the
Fortelle while crying my eyes out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fce
STRING: [Cordell] “And upon doing so, well... Everyone that
heard the sound of my Fortelle that night showered me
with praise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ff6
STRING: [Cordell] “The sadness of a broken heart gave emotion
to my music, and made it into something special.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2016
STRING: [Torta] “By that, you mean...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2034
STRING: [Cordell] “However, the next day I was over it. And the
way I played music had reverted to how it always was.
Sadness isn't forever. It only feels like it might
be forever at the time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2066
STRING: [Cordell] “However, when you're in the middle of
something like this, you can't really reflect in such a
way. But, when looking at the bigger picture, it's
just something to laugh
[Cordell] about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2090
STRING: [Torta] “But for me... The bigger picture is right here
and now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c2
STRING: [Cordell] “The funny part is coming up next.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20d8
STRING: Ignoring me, Ms. Cordell continued to speak in her
indifferent tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ec
STRING: [Cordell] “I think it was the day after that. He came to
me and said that he loved me, and that he was sorry for
not being honest about how he felt. I was in a state
of bliss.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2116
STRING: [Torta] “And then, the way you played lost its appeal? Is
that supposed to be the funny part?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x213e
STRING: [Cordell] “In the blissful state that I was in, I again
received wonderful praise. I believe they said something
to the effect that happiness flowed from the music I
played.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2184
STRING: [Cordell] “However... There isn't even a trace of that left
now. I never had a particularly intense range of
emotion, so unless something really big happened,
there was never really
[Cordell] much change in the way my music sounded.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21b6
STRING: [Cordell] “But... There is a special kind of music that is
found through happiness. Even if it meant for Chris that
he would lose the thing that currently gives appeal
to the way he plays.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21fc
STRING: [Cordell] “I cannot help but feel that you could create
that, Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x221c
STRING: [Torta] “It's impossible for me...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x224e
STRING: [Cordell] “What is?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2264
STRING: [Torta] “I... Can't say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2282
STRING: [Cordell] “You don't need to. However, you need to
think long and hard about what you think is impossible,
and why you feel that way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ac
STRING: [Torta] “It's just... Impossible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ca
STRING: [Cordell] “Very well. In the end it's you who decides
that. I will speak no more of it. However, allow me to
say one last thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2310
STRING: [Cordell] “I think that you may be capable of making
Chris change. In a way that's for the best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2330
STRING: [Torta] “...Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2346
STRING: I gained just a little confidence from those words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2352
STRING: But, Ms. Cordell knew nothing of my sister, or the
illusions that Chris saw.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2368
STRING: It was hard to feel a sense of reality from her words
because of this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2390
STRING: [Cordell] “I don't know anything, not about Chris, or the
problems you are facing. But, that means there are
some things that I can see objectively.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23b0
STRING: Ms. Cordell spoke almost as if she could read my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23bc
STRING: [Torta] “How could you tell that...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ee
STRING: [Cordell] “A lot of things become apparent when you
get older.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2404
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, okay... Thank you for saying that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x241a
STRING: It was just by a little, but I felt a little more cheerful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2426
STRING: Ms. Cordell said that even I could do it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2432
STRING: That I could change Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x243e
STRING: I felt that now I could listen to what she was saying with
a more positive attitude.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2470
STRING: [Cordell] “That's the rest of the story.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2486
STRING: [Torta] “What...? But, what happened with him after
that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a4
STRING: [Cordell] “I suppose he was being whimsical. He
changed his mind after that... And everything ended.
And to think that at one point we were engaged,
too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ce
STRING: [Torta] “That's terrible...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ec
STRING: [Cordell] “It was over 20 years ago. There's nothing left
for you to be concerned about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250c
STRING: [Torta] “20 years ago...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2522
STRING: Wait a minute, just how old was Ms. Cordell...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252e
STRING: [Torta] “Um, if you don't mind me asking, how old are

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2560
STRING: [Cordell] “Tortinita, it's rude to ask a lady her age.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2576
STRING: [Torta] “I... I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a8
STRING: [Cordell] “I'm still in my 20s. All of that happened when I
was around five, I think? He was a childhood friend and
I was in love. Apparently I said I was going to
marry him.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25d2
STRING: [Torta] “Aha-ha!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25f0
STRING: [Cordell] “You're finally smiling. Good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2606
STRING: [Torta] “I am, aren't I? Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2624
STRING: [Cordell] “Actually, I think I'd prefer it if you didn't tell
Chris about this. Or Asino, either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2644
STRING: [Torta] “You're a lot more interesting than I thought...
Oh, I'm sorry, how rude of me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2680
STRING: [Cordell] “No, it's quite true that I am not an overly
interesting person. Although, I don't think I am a
particularly gloomy person, either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a0
STRING: [Torta] “That's true... But, why is it that you told me all
of this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c8
STRING: [Cordell] “Because I'm fond of Chris. And of course, you,
and Asino too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26e8
STRING: [Torta] “I don't think I deserve that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2706
STRING: [Cordell] “Qualifications or reasons are not needed for
one to like someone. If I decide I like someone, then
that's that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2726
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2744
STRING: [Cordell] “In any case, come see me any time you need
to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x275a
STRING: [Torta] “I will... Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x278c
STRING: [Cordell] “I see you're learning to say the right thing
now. Well, you should get going. Chris is probably
starting to worry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ac
STRING: [Torta] “Okay. Again, thank you so much for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c2
STRING: I bowed deeply, and left the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27fa
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks for waiting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2810
STRING: Looking at the clock on the practice room wall, I
realized that about thirty minutes or so had passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2842
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Welcome back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2858
STRING: [Torta] “Well, we don't have any time to waste, let's get
practicing!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2878
STRING: I couldn't tell Chris about what we had discussed, so I
decided to be a little pushy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2896
STRING: [Chris] “It ended up taking a while, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ac
STRING: [Torta] “I guess so. It got a little complicated.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28de
STRING: [Chris] “You look like you had a good time though, all
things considered.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28f4
STRING: [Torta] “A little. Anyway, practice time!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2916
STRING: I wasn't faking it, or pretending; right now for the time
being I felt I was happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x292c
STRING: I doubt I would be able to forget the words Ms. Cordell
said to me any time soon, or the unexpected side of
herself that she showed me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x294c
STRING: “I think that you may capable of making Chris change. In
a way that's for the best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2962
STRING: I wholeheartedly felt like I wanted to believe her now.
